name: Superman
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on the floor with your arms and legs extended straight out in front of you, forming an X-shape with your body.

2. Engage your core muscles by drawing your belly button towards your spine.

3. Lift your arms and legs off the ground, holding them high above your upper back and lower back respectively.

4. Hold this position for a brief moment to emphasize engagement in your core muscles and stabilization of your body.

5. Slowly lower your arms and legs back down to the starting position without touching the floor.

6. Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, maintaining control throughout the exercise and keeping your core engaged.
short_summary: The Superman is an abdominal exercise that targets the upper and lower abs while engaging the core muscles to stabilize the body in a straight line.
